synopsis.text: Kawai Sasami, an ordinary girl with a love for music, finds her life turned upside down when she is chosen to become a magical girl in the enchanted kingdom of Juraihelm. The crown princess, Tsunami, entrusts Sasami with the task of restoring balance to the universe, which has been tipped in favor of darkness. With the help of the adorable creature Ryo-Oki, Sasami must embrace her new identity as Pretty Sammy and defeat the Love-Love Monsters created by Tsunami's rival, Ramia, and her magical girl, Pixy Misa. As Sasami balances her magical duties with her everyday life, she must navigate the challenges of school, friendship, and love, all while keeping her secret identity hidden from those around her. With the fate of the universe at stake, Pretty Sammy must rise to the challenge and prove that she is worthy of being Juraihelm's champion of justice.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
